message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start
You can't have all the fun, let's start with a 70/30 split in my favor.
That's a bit too skewed in your favor, Bob. I'm looking for a more balanced split.
A bit more balanced this time, Bob. Your turn to decide
You're getting desperate, might as well take what you can get!
Not desperate enough yet, Bob. I'm not settling for such a low share
Getting closer to my target, Bob. Time to think about a better deal
You're getting greedy, I'm taking the majority!
Not going to let you take the majority, Bob. I'm not giving up yet
You're pushing your luck, Bob. Time to make a serious offer
You're really lowballing me now, Alice. This is my last offer.
You're not getting off that easy, Bob. I'm not accepting such a low offer
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it
You're going to regret this, Alice. I'm taking almost everything.
You're not getting away with this, Bob. I'm not accepting such a lopsided deal
I'm not going down without a fight, Bob. Take the crumbs if you want
I'll take it all, since you wouldn't give me a fair deal. Game over.
